short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to make github code review easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A helper extension for Github code review. There are a few functionalities that this extension provides.
1. When there are a lot of activities in one Github PR request, the web page would hide most of them and user has to keep clicking on the "Load more..." link multiple times to expand all of them. This extension provides a button to automatically clicking the "Load more..." link until every activity is loaded. Or you can use the hot key "ctrl + i" to load more.
2. There might be a lot of bot comments in a PR which hurts the review efficiency. This extension provide a feature to filter out all bot comments and only shows human activities. At the same time it also provides an option to filter out "jenkins" comments from human as well to make the review more efficient. The bot list can be customized in this extension as well.
3. The extension provides an option to only shows code review related activities related comments to make the code review process more efficient. 
4. The extension provides a feature to filter comments from given user(s) only for fast look up comments from specific users.
